amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-12 to require Local Education Agencies (LEA) to provide the parents of a child who is a student in an elementary school or secondary school the number of school counselors in that school.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bacon amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Bacon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bacon amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
